section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the disposition to announce in Common Cause against Schmitt and Federal Election Commission against Americans for Change.
And in a per curiam opinion filed with the clerk this morning the judgments of the United States District Court for the District of Columbia Circuit are affirmed by an equally divided court.
Justice O'Connor took no part in the consideration or the decision of this case.
